header.title: cosProperty

erlref.modulesummary: The main module of the cosProperty application

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosProperty/include/*.hrl").
This module contains the functions for starting and stopping the application.

func.name: install() -> Return
func.fsummary: Install the cosProperty application in the IFR

desc.p: This operation installs the cosProperty application in the IFR.

func.name: install_db() -> Return
func.fsummary: Install data in mnesia necessary for running the cosProperty application

desc.p: This operation installs data in mnesia necessary for running the cosProperty application.

func.name: uninstall() -> Return
func.fsummary: Remove all data in the IFR related to the cosProperty application

desc.p: This operation removes all data in the IFR related to the cosProperty application.

func.name: uninstall_db() -> Return
func.fsummary: Remove all data from mnesia related to the cosProperty application

desc.p: This operation removes all data from mnesia related to the cosProperty application.
This operation starts the cosProperty application.
This operation starts a PropertySetDef Factory.
This operation starts a PropertySet Factory.
This operation stops the supplied PropertySetDef Factory.
This operation stops the supplied PropertySet Factory.
This operation stops the cosProperty application.
